description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with Oreo sandwich cookie pieces.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk
Fresh mint ice cream with pieces of Andes Crème de Menthe candies
Bahama Bluebs blueberries and cream cheese, with broken graham crackers mixed in.
Nilla wafer pieces in a banana ice cream base.
Sweet local corn, with a swirl of fresh local blueberries!
A vegan pea protein base with fresh bananas and cinnamon blended in.
Bittersweet chocolate is melted into a coconut milk base for a super smooth and creamy vegan ice cream. Probably the best vegan ice cream we’ve made yet. (Now soy-free!)
